description: With her husband constantly on the road, married life is starting to seem more like single life without benefits to the bored and lonely, Lorelei Lee. After yet another solo night with her wine, chips and late night TV, Lorelei is awaken from her dosing by an ad for electro-toys. The purring voice from the lady announcer, convince Lorelei to order an over night delivery of the deluxe package of toys, rope and bondage tape. Only problem now is she needs someone to try the plugs, zappers and electro-pads on. This hot sex toy package was just about to become a depressing reminder of her lonely life, when a knock at the door changes everything. Casey is selling chocolate bars to raise money for her softball team and her timing is perfect. Lorelei pounces on her, uses her bondage tape to tie her up and fucks her pussy on the kitchen table. The sex moves to the bedroom with Lorelei tying up, fucking and getting fucked by Casey and the electrical toys.
title: The Lonely Housewife: An Electrosluts.com Feature Presentation
